articles.title: Joint Calls Issued to Mark 65th Anniversary of WPK
articles.content:
Joint Calls Issued to Mark 65th Anniversary of WPK
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea issued joint calls on February 3 to mark the 65th birthday of the WPK, expressing firm belief that all the Party members, servicepersons and people will intensify the drive for a great revolutionary surge on all fronts in hearty response to the Party's appeal and thus glorify this significant year as a year of great changes to be especially recorded in the history of the country and as a year of prosperity in which the people will fully enjoy happiness.
					The calls stress that they are faced with vast tasks this year but they are sure to win a shining victory in the on-going sweeping campaign and more loudly shout hurrah for socialism and sing the song of Arirang of prosperity as there are the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the unbreakable single-minded unity of the Party, the army and the people around the headquarters of the revolution, the powerful military strength and the solid foundation of the self-supporting economy.
					
					 They say that it is the greatest cause in the nation's history for perpetuating the memory of President Kim Il Sung to glorify his country as a great prosperous and powerful nation and it is, at the same time, a noble moral obligation of the service personnel and people, his soldiers and disciples.
					
					 It is the highest tribute to the President to implement his behests to the letter, they note, stressing the need to devotedly realize what he planned and desired in his lifetime just as the workers of the Songjin Steel Complex did and make the legendary Chollima brought by him fly higher in the sky over Songun Korea.
					
					The on-going advance for a great surge is an advance being made by the entire Party and army and all the people on the basis of single-minded unity for ushering in the era of great prosperity of
						 Kim Il Sung's nation, rallied close around Kim Jong Il, they say, and go on:
					
					 Exalt the nation's honor of holding in high esteem Comrade Kim Jong Il, the peerlessly brilliant commander!
					
					 Devotedly defend Comrade Kim Jong Il by winning a victory in the drive for a great surge!
					
					Let us defend with our very lives the leadership of revolution headed by the great Comrade
						 Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Let us cement as firm as an iron wall the single-minded unity of the Party, the army and the people around the great Comrade Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Let us regard the Songun idea and leadership exploits of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il as our lifeline and glorify them forever!
					
					Build a paradise of happiness under the blue sky of Songun provided by the great General
						 Kim Jong Il!
					
					 Let us breathe the same breath and keep pace with the forced march of Comrade Kim Jong Il, the peerless patriot!
					
					 Let us become true patriots of Songun Korea who have personified the great Comrade Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on the country and play the role of a foundation of a thriving nation!
					
					 Give full play to the great mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation to bring about great innovations and leap forward on all fronts for building a thriving nation!
					
					 It is the fixed will of the WPK to bring great happiness to our people who have steadfastly made a long and arduous march, following the Party, and it is the general orientation of the drive for a great surge this year to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living, the calls point out, and continue:
					
					Courageously turn out in the general offensive for improving the people's standard of living in hearty response to the appeal of the workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex!
					
					 Dash ahead, racing against the time at "the Huichon Speed", a new Chollima speed in the era of Songun!
					
					 Surpass the level of the peak production year at all sectors and units!
					
					 Bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea!
					
					 Carry through the Party's policy of making a revolution in light industry!
					
					 Drastically increase the production of consumer goods through the efforts of the whole Party and state!
					
					 All sectors and units, supply in time raw and other materials needed for the production of light industrial goods!
					
					 All efforts for implementing the Party's policy of agricultural revolution!
					
					 All agricultural workers!
					
					 Bring rich harvests of all crops and fruits this year marking the 65th birthday of the WPK!
					
					 Pile up stacks of harvested bumper crops in all farm fields across the country!
					
					 A high pile of compost means a high heap of grain. Produce a large quantity of organic fertilizer to turn all paddy and non-paddy fields fertile!
					
					 Increase the production of meat, eggs and processed milk to make the people's diet bountiful!
					
					 Turn all orchards into thriving orchards and put the fruit farming on a scientific and modern basis!
					
					 Radically increase the production of vegetables and industrial crops!
					
					 Boost the production of cocoon and cotton to make silk and other textiles come out in an endless stream!
					
					 The whole Party and country and all the people, render strong support to the countryside!
					
					 Let's increase aquatic production to make the people's diet bountiful!
					
					 Expand and develop foreign trade to make a positive contribution to improving the people's standard of living!
					
					 The workers in the field of metal industry!
					
					 Hit the target for the production of pig iron, steel and rolled steel set by the Party!
					
					 Round off the Juche-based steel-making system and drastically increase the production of iron and steel!
					
					 The workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex!
					
					 Hold high the torch lit at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex as well as the torch kindled in Kangson and make a breakthrough towards improving the people's standard of living!
					
					 Mine more iron ore and send it to the metallurgical bases!
					
					 The workers in the field of power industry!
					
					 Drastically increase the power production to make the whole country alive with the drive for a great surge and turn it into a brightly lit paradise!
					
					 Build many small- and medium-size power stations which ensure great profitability to increase the number of villages and counties rich in electricity!
					
					 The workers in the field of coal industry!
					
					 Send more quality coal to the thermal power plants and metal, chemical and light industrial factories!
					
					 The workers in the field of railway transport!
					
					 Wage a dynamic drive for increased transport and carry greater quantities of freight faster to the fronts for bringing about a great surge including light industry and agriculture!
					
					 Decisively increase the production of electrical and diesel engines and wagons and reinforce the railroads!
					
					 Intensify the coordinated railway-motor way-marine transport!
					
					 Let the whole country turn out to render strong support to the fields of power, coal and metal industries and railway transport!
					
					 The workers of the February 8 Vinalon Complex!
					
					 Effect a great surge in the production of chemical goods to put spurs to light industry and agriculture!
					
					 Fertilizer producers across the country including the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex!
					
					 Fertilizer precisely means rice. Produce more fertilizers and send them to the agricultural front!
					
					 The workers in the field of machine-building industry!
					
					 Produce more modern textile, shoe-making and food processing equipment and farm machines and send them to the fields of light industry and agriculture!
					
					 Produce and supply major custom-built equipment in good time in a responsible manner!
					
					 Produce more CNC machine tools, a pride of the Juche industry!
					
					 Energetically put machines and equipment on a CNC basis!
					
					 Actively contrive and manufacture new type machines and equipment!
					
					 Step up the modernization of the tool production bases to intensify the revolution in the production of tools!
					
					 Let the whole Party and army and all the people turn out to dynamically step up the construction of the Huichon Power Station true to the militant tasks set forth in Kim Jong Il's letter of special thanks!
					
					 Create new "Pyongyang speed" in the construction of the capital city to bring about "prosperity of Pyongyang" in the era of Songun!
					
					Build 100,000 flats in the city of Pyongyang at the best level with those in Mansudae Street as a model!
					
					 Bring about a revolutionary turn in the city management in order to provide the people with modern living conditions!
					
					 Step up the road revolution to make roads more modern and solid!
					
					 Let's turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery!
					
					 Let's turn all cities and villages into those in parks clad in thick verdure!
					
					 Discover more underground treasures!
					
					 Step up the modernization of post and tele-communications to provide every convenience to the people's living!
					
					 Officials in the field of economy!
					
					 Strictly abide by the socialist principles in economic management!
					
					 Work out scientific management and business strategies and actively accelerate the advance for a great surge!
					
					 Establish strict planning and financial disciplines!
					
					 Self-reliance is the only way out!
					
					 Let's decisively frustrate the "sanctions" of the imperialists through a high-pitched drive for a great surge based on self-reliance!
					
					 Let's successfully put the production processes on an indigenous and Juche basis on all fronts for economic construction with the same mettle as displayed by the workers of the Songjin Steel Complex!
					
					 Push back the frontiers of science and technology!
					
					 Courageously rush towards the world!
					
					 Conceive and create everything our own way!
					
					 Plant our feet on our land and look at the world!
					
					 Create everything our own way to be far better than others and be bold enough to create everything new in the world!
					
					 Explore cutting-edge technology as required by the age of knowledge-based economy and leap higher and faster!
					
					 Boost the creative cooperation among scientists, workers and technicians to energetically push forward the work for putting the production processes on modern and IT basis!
					
					 Conduct the brain and technology campaign to surpass the world level!
					
					 Hold supremacy in all spheres in the same spirit as displayed in scaling the eminence of CNC technology!
					
					 All the scientists and technicians!
					
					 Become pioneers in pushing back the frontiers of science and technology in the IT age!
					
					 Put all the fields of science and technology on the ultra-modern level in the same spirit as displayed in acquiring the space science and technology and nuclear technology!
					
					 Make a great leap forward in the development of IT and Nano technology and bio-engineering! 
					
					 Rapidly develop technological engineering and basic science!
					
					 A great prosperous and powerful nation of Juche is a highly civilized one with developed culture and the spirit of pushing back the frontiers of science and technology should run high in the field of culture, too, the calls note, and go on:
					
					 Let's glorify our country as a world educational power with a large contingent of talents!
					
					 Train reliable hard cores for the Songun revolution equipped with noble spirit and a wealth of knowledge!
					
					 Develop the education to give fuller play to the advantages of the free compulsory educational system! 
					
					 Thoroughly implement the Party's policy on preventive medicine!
					
					 Decisively increase the production of ordinary and essential medicine to make the free medical care system pay off profusely!
					
					 Dynamically conduct the ideological campaign, fighting spirit battle and speed and technical campaigns to create new "myth of sports" of Songun Korea!
					
					 Popularize physical culture and sports and make them part of one's daily life to be ready for labor and national defence!
					
					 Make revolutions in movies and literature and arts in the era of Songun with an innovative eye of the 21st century and creative way and work style dating back to the 1970s!
					
					 Media persons, become buglers in the charge powerfully arousing all the service personnel and people to a campaign for a great surge!
					
					 It is the philosophy of arms of Mt. Paektu to accomplish with arms the revolutionary cause of Juche started with arms and a great surge today is the one of Songun, the calls note, and go on:
					
					 All men and officers of the KPA, the Korean People's Security Forces and people's security institutions!
					
					 Firmly guarantee the victory in the great drive for building a thriving nation and the happiness of the people with matchless arms!
					
					 More thoroughly establish respected Supreme Commander Comrade Kim Jong Il's unitary commanding system and revolutionary military discipline throughout the army!
					
					 Revolutionize the whole army and arm it with socialist patriotism!
					
					 Give full play to the trait of assisting people to cement the great unity of the army and the people, the foundation of Songun Korea, as firm as an iron wall!
					
					 Glorify this significant year marking the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea with laudable successes in making combat preparations and boosting the combat capability!
					
					 Firmly combat any illusion about the enemy and "peace!"
					
					 Keep a sharp eye on the enemies' maneuvers and be fully ready!
					
					 Mercilessly wipe out any enemy coming in attack and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification!
					
					 Create a model of society in the revolutionary soldier spirit which helps turn everything impossible into something possible and dynamically lead the advance for a great surge!
					
					 Resolutely foil the psychological warfare of enemies to make the army degenerate ideologically and morally!
					
					 The organs of the people's security, become the Supreme Commander's reliable interior force firmly defending the outpost of the class struggle!
					
					 The people's security, judicial and prosecution organs, creditably discharge the honorable mission to defend the leader, the system and the people!
					
					 The national defence industry is a source of the dignity and mightiness of Songun Korea and a sure guarantee for improving the people's standard of living, the calls say, and go on:
					
					 Workers in the field of national defence industry!
					
					 Firmly reinforce the arsenal of a thriving nation, the revolutionary industry of Mt. Paektu!
					
					 Sound the drive for victory in the sector of national defence industry to open the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation!
					
					 All sectors and units, supply everything needed for the development of national defence industry in time on a top-priority basis!
					
					 Sincerely assist the People's Army!
					
					 Put all the people under arms and fortify the whole country at a higher level! 
					
					 Members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards!
					
					 Get fully ready to go into action with a transparent view on the fight against the enemy! 
					
					 The calls underline the need to thoroughly establish the unitary leadership system of Kim Jong Il throughout the party, adding:
					
					 Firmly preserve and eternally glorify feats performed by the great Comrade Kim Jong Il in the party building!
					
					 Develop our Party into a promising party steadfastly carrying forward the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu! 
					
					 Let the whole party breathe and act in line with the great Comrade Kim Jong Il's idea of effecting a great surge and his spirit of the forced march!
					
					 Thoroughly implement the Party's mass line!
					
					 We serve the people!
					
					 Strengthen the Party leadership over administrative and economic work as required by the building of a thriving nation!
					
					 Effectively wage the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement so that its red flags may fly in each work site for a great surge!
					
					 Let more persons of merit in the Songun era emerge in the drive for a great surge!
					
					 Supply service precisely means political work!
					
					 Consider supply service as an important part of the party work!
					
					 Increase the function and role of the people's power in every way as required by the building of a thriving nation!
					
					 Preserve the Juche character and national identity in all fields of state activities!
					
					 Strengthen the observance of socialist law to firmly establish the revolutionary law and order!
					
					 The power organs, devote themselves to the well-being of the people!
					
					 All the officials!
					
					 Let us become comrades in the forced march who have the same idea, determination and pace as the great Comrade Kim Jong Il's!
					
					 Carry through the Party's policies in a do-or-die spirit under any hard conditions to become staunch implementers unfolding all fantastic sceneries of Songun!
					
					 All the Party members!
					
					 Let the Party members become vanguard fighters devotedly defending the leader, first-line workers in the campaign for a great surge and skilful agitators for masses!
					
					 The working people's organizations, creditably play the role of transmission belts for the Party and its reliable helpers in the on-going advance for a great surge!
					
					 Let them strengthen the organizational and political work to give fullest play to the mental power of their members and briskly wage the mass movement including socialist emulation!
					
					 National reunification is the most urgent task of the nation, the calls note, and go on:
					
					 Let us carry out the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's instructions for national reunification!
					
					 Let the entire nation unite under the banner of the north-south joint declarations and achieve national reunification at the earliest date!
					
					 Let us bring about a new phase in independent reunification this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo!
					
					 Let us frustrate the anti-reunification forces' confrontation with fellow countrymen and actively realize national reconciliation and cooperation!
					
					 All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad!
					
					 Let us build a great dignified, prosperous and reunified power on the land of three thousand-ri and hand it down to posterity!
					
					 Independence means justice and justice is sure to win!
					
					 Firmly maintain an independent stand in foreign relations and demonstrate the dignity and spirit of Songun Korea before the whole world!
					
					 Let us defend and advance socialism, the ideal and future of humankind!
					
					 Let us smash the imperialists' moves for a war of aggression and protect peace on the Korean Peninsula and the world!
					
					 Let us expand and develop the good neighborly and friendly relations with all the countries of the world that respect the sovereignty of our country!
					
					 All the Party members and servicepersons and people!
					
					 The drive for a great surge is sure to triumph and a rosy future is in store for us.
					
					 Let us all dash towards the square for October celebrations full of conviction of sure victory and optimism!
					
					  Let us successfully realize the lifelong desire and idea of President Kim Il Sung who dedicated all his life to the people's happiness and make a report of victory and joy to him in profound reverence!
					
					 Make the world look up to the great Party and Kim Il Sung's Korea!

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Grenadian PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Grenadian PM
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Premier of the DPRK Kim Yong Il Saturday sent a message of greetings to Tillman Thomas, Prime Minister of Grenada, on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of its independence.
					The message wished the friendly Grenadian people prosperity and welfare.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Congratulates Tunisian PM
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Congratulates Tunisian PM
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Premier Kim Yong Il Friday sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Ghannouchi on his stay in office as Prime Minister of Tunisia.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished him greater success in his future work for progress and prosperity of the country.
					
					 Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun sent a similar message to Kamel Morjane upon his appointment as foreign minister of Tunisia on the same day.

articles.title: Chinese Party Delegation Here
articles.content:
Chinese Party Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China led by Head Wang Jiarui arrived here Saturday by air.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Nigeria Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Nigeria Appointed
Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Jong Hak Se was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Nigeria, according to a decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Sports Contests to Be Held in Feb.
articles.content:
Sports Contests to Be Held in Feb.
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Colorful sports meets are planned to be held on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, February 16, in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The 19th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize is to be held at Ice Rink located on the bank of River Pothong to celebrate it as a common holiday of all people over the world.
					
					 Famous figure skaters from the DPRK and other countries will take part in the festival from February 15 to 17.
					
					 A demonstration performance of synchronized swimming will be given by local girls at the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex to add to the celebration of the holiday.
					
					 Also included in the schedule is a Paektusan Prize sports contest involving such events as basketball, volleyball, figure skating and short track speed skating.

articles.title: End to Racket for Confrontation with DPRK Called for
articles.content:
End to Racket for Confrontation with DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- In order to improve the deteriorated inter-Korean relations and bring about a new phase in accomplishing the cause of reunification this year it is necessary to put an end to the anti-DPRK confrontation moves in south Korea at an early date as they are quite contrary to the trend of the times.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group is desperately escalating confrontation with the DPRK, laying a stumbling block in the way of achieving national unity and improving the inter-Korean relations, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities set the "active discussion on the nuclear issue in inter-Korean dialogue", an issue utterly indifferent to the inter-Korean relations, as the core of the "policy toward the north" this year, while talking about what they called "the development of the principled south-north relations" in a "business report for 2010."
					
					This assertion, an extension of the watchwords of "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" symbolic of anti-reunification and confrontation policy, was prompted by their sinister intention to prevent the inter-Korean relations from making progress and escalate nuclear racket against the DPRK in conspiracy with foreign forces under the pretext of the nuclear issue.
					
					 Their moves to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK and kick off a racket for confrontation between systems are deliberate and premeditated anti-reunification acts to chill the atmosphere of the improved inter-Korean relations and drive the situation to catastrophe.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group worked out such scenario for invading the north as the "study of long-term program for unification" under the pretext of coping with nonsensical "emergency situation." This is a manifestation of their black-hearted intention to deny the dignified system in the DPRK and realize their wild ambition for "unification by absorption."
					
					 The south Korean authorities' fascist suppression of reunification movement is an unpardonable criminal act of doing harm to the reconciliation and unity of the nation.
					
					 It is impossible for the people from all walks of life to hold free reunification-oriented discussion and activities nor is it possible to make contacts and exchange between fellow countrymen as long as the above-said brutal suppression is allowed in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean conservative authorities hell-bent on the moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK are a main block lying in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: Tightened "Alliance" for Aggression Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Tightened "Alliance" for Aggression Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 3, to denounce the U.S. and the south Korean authorities' criminal moves for tightened "alliance" for aggression.
					 At the conference the organization noted that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are holding a confab to discuss such matters of strengthening their "alliance" as the enactment of "defense guidelines" and the promotion of "strategic flexibility" of the U.S. forces present in south Korea.
					
					 In this way the U.S. seeks to maintain its daily weakening military hegemony with the resources of its satellite forces, it pointed out, saying: This action will not only bring in bolder relief the aggressive nature of "alliance" and the south Korean army's dependence on the U.S. but also pose a serious threat to the peace of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The organization demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop such scheme at once and roll back their hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Eq. Guinea PM Supports DPRK FM Statement
articles.content:
Eq. Guinea PM Supports DPRK FM Statement
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The friendly relationship between Equatorial Guinea and the DPRK is historic one with long tradition, said Ignacio Milan Tang, prime minister of Equatorial Guinea, on Feb. 1 when meeting the DPRK ambassador to his country who paid a courtesy call on him.
					 The Equatorial Guinean government will never forget the fact that President Kim Il Sung rendered positive support to the struggle for the independence of Equatorial Guinea and building a new society there, he said, adding:
					
					 The Equatorial Guinean government fully supports the principled stand of the DPRK government to put an end to national division and the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry calling for conclusion of a peace treaty, in particular.
					
					 We are convinced that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will as ever develop on good terms.
					
					 The Equatorial Guinean government will do its utmost to boost the cooperation with the fraternal Korean people in politics and economy.

articles.title: Indonesian Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Indonesian Figure Praises Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, issued a statement on Feb. 1 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement praised Kim Jong Il as the prominent state leader who has performed great exploits for the country and the nation by wisely leading the Korean people in the efforts for building of a thriving socialist nation and national reunification with his Songun politics.
					
					 Today the Korean people have turned out in the vigorous drive to bring about a decisive turn in improving the people's standard of living in hearty response to the joint New Year editorial, it said, adding:
					
					We are convinced that under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il they will make great successes in the efforts to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President
						 Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibition Held in China
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- The Youth Federation of Korean Nationals in China sponsored the Kimjongilia exhibition in Shenyang on Feb. 2 to celebrate February 16, the greatest national holiday.
					 Present there were Chairperson Choe Un Bok and officials of the General Association of Koreans in China, Koreans in China, the consul general and staff members of the DPRK Consulate General in Shenyang, members of DPRK branch offices in China and Chinese officials in Liaoning Province.
					
					 Speakers at the exhibition said that Kimjongilia, the flower of the sun, will come into full bloom in the whole world in the boundless reverence of the world progressives for the peerlessly great man.
					
					 They stressed that the Korean people are sure to emerge victorious in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation, rallied close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Exhibition Held in Finland
articles.content:
DPRK Exhibition Held in Finland
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition took place in Finland from Jan. 24 to 27.
					 On display in its venue were books and photos on Songun Korea's efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and handicrafts associated with creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, and Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, introduced to the visitors the efforts of the Korean people who have turned out as one in building a thriving nation, closely rallied in mind around General Secretary Kim Jong Il, performing heroic feats and the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Finland.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, February 6 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian preparatory committee was formed in Jakarta on Feb. 1 to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the days from Feb. 1 to 18 as a celebration period and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la opera "Evgueni Oneguin"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la opera "Evgueni Oneguin"
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio el dia 5 la funcion de la opera "Evgueni Oneguin" en ocasion del 10o aniversario de la concertacion del Tratado sobre la Amistad, Buena Vecindad y Cooperacion entre Corea y Rusia.
					El Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang reinterpreto conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo esa opera rusa que habia sido estrenada en 1958.
					
					 El Dirigente evaluo altamente el exito logrado por los profesores, empleados y estudiantes del Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang en la creacion de la opera y les dio agradecimiento mostrandose muy regocijado de que ellos hayan creado con la vision innovadora del nuevo siglo y el modo de creacion y el estilo de lucha de la decada de 1970 esa excelente obra de alto nivel artistico.
					
					 Deviene un gran exito el hecho de que los estudiantes jovenes del Conservatorio cumplieron satisfactoriamente la dificil tarea de crear la opera clasica extranjera empleando plenamente sus grandes talentos artisticos comparables con los de artistas profesionales, dijo y volvio a ponerse muy satisfecho de la firme continuacion del linaje del arte del Juche.
					
					 La opera clasica rusa "Evgueni Oneguin" es la obra que tiene importancia practica hasta hoy dia, senalo y enfatizo que se debe mostrarla mucho a los jovenes y otros miembros de la nueva generacion.
					
					 El pueblo coreano, que tiene los bienes culturales de talla mundial como las cinco operas revolucionarias y avanza dignamente hacia el mundo teniendo el gran orgullo nacional de poder vivir en un futuro cercano en la gran potencia prospera, debe conocer mejor tambien la cultura mundial, subrayo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en desarrollar el arte jucheano.
					
					 El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por Kim Yong Chun, vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kim Jong Gak, miembro del CDN de la RPDC y primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General de EPC, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito, los secretarios Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek y Kim Yang Gon, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, asi como el primer viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores Kang Sok Ju.
					
					 Estuvieron presentes tambien el embajador de la Federacion Rusa, Valery Sukhinin, y otros diplomaticos de la embajada rusa en Corea.

articles.title: Publicadas consignas conjuntas de CC y CMC del PTC
articles.content:
Publicadas consignas conjuntas de CC y CMC del PTC
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Comite Central (CC) y la Comision Militar Central (CMC) del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) hicieron publica el dia 3 las consignas conjuntas en ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC, bien convencidos de que todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes promoveran un gran auge revolucionario en todos los dominios respondiendo con el corazon al llamamiento del partido, de modo que brille este ano significativo como ano de gran cambio, que se registre en letras doradas en los anales de la patria, y el de prosperidad en que se acreciente al maximo la felicidad del pueblo.
					Aunque es inmensa la tarea que tenemos este ano, alcanzaremos sin falta la fulminante victoria en la gran batalla de hoy y corearemos mas fuertemente !viva el socialismo! y la cancion Arirang de prosperidad porque contamos con la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la inquebrantable unidad monolitica entre el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo centrada en la Direccion de la Revolucion, el potente poderio militar y la solida base de la economia autarquica, comienzan las consignas.
					
					Senalan que convertir el pais del Presidente         Kim Il Sung en la gran potencia prospera deviene la maxima causa historica de la nacion por la eternidad de este lider padre y la sublime obligacion moral de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, soldados y discipulos de el.
					
					Materializar consecuentemente el legado del lider padre significa el maximo homenaje a el, indican y llaman a poner en practica con sacrificio, al igual que la clase obrera de Songgang (Complejo de Acero de Songjin), todo lo que proyectaba y deseaba el en su vida y hacer volar a lo alto del cielo de la Corea del Songun el legendario Chollima buscado por el.
					
					La gran marcha de hoy por el gran auge es el avance que emprenden todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo para abrir la epoca de gran prosperidad de la nacion de Kim Il Sung unidos firme y monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente     Kim Jong Il, subrayan las consignas.
					
					Abajo se transmiten literalmente algunas de ellas:
					
					!Glorifiquemos a la vista de todo el mundo a la nacion que enaltece al camarada Kim Jong Il, genial comandante sin par!
					
					!Defendamos a costa de la vida al camarada      Kim Jong Il con el triunfo del gran auge!
					
					!Defendamos a vida o muerte la Direccion de la Revolucion encabezada por el gran camarada
						 Kim Jong Il!
					
					 !Hagamos mas solida la unidad monolitica entre el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo en torno al gran camarada Kim Jong Il! 
					
					 !Demos eterna vigencia a la idea del Songun del gran camarada Kim Jong Il y sus hazanas de direccion tomandolas como linea vital!
					
					 !Construyamos el paraiso de felicidad bajo el cielo azul asegurado por el gran General Kim Jong Il en virtud del Songun!
					
					 !Marquemos los latidos del corazon y ajustemos el paso de avance con la marcha forzada que emprende el camarada Kim Jong Il, patriota sin par!
					
					 !Seamos verdaderos patriotas de la Corea del Songun y raiz de la gran potencia prospera, que encarnan la noble concepcion de la patria del gran camarada Kim Jong Il!
					
					 !Logremos gran innovacion y gran salto en todos los frentes de la construccion de la gran potencia prospera explotando plenamente la gran potencia espiritual de la nacion de Kim Il Sung!
					
					 Las consignas sostienen que nuestro partido tiene la firme voluntad de hacer feliz en todos los aspectos a nuestro pueblo, que ha venido recorriendo firmemente el largo camino lleno de pruebas siguiendo al partido, y el rumbo de lucha general de la marcha del gran auge de este ano es imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo, y continuan:
					
					 !Levantemonos con valentia en la ofensiva general por el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo respondiendo con entusiasmo al llamamiento de la clase obrera de Kimchol (Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek)!
					
					 !Avancemos de viento en popa acortando el siglo con la nueva velocidad de Chollima, la de Huichon de la epoca del Songun!
					
					 !Que todas las ramas y unidades superen el nivel del ano en que se registro el record de produccion!
					
					  !Este ano del aniversario 65 de la fundacion del Partido, imprimamos un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo dando otro acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura!
					
					  !Materialicemos cabalmente la orientacion del Partido de registrar una revolucion en la industria ligera!
					
					  !Incrementemos en gran medida la produccion de los articulos de consumo popular concentrando las fuerzas de todo el partido y todo el Estado!
					
					  !Que todos los dominios y unidades abastezcan a tiempo de las materias primas y materiales necesarios a la produccion de los articulos de industria ligera!
					
					  !Todos a la materializacion de la orientacion del partido de producir una revolucion en la agricultura!
					
					  !Todos los trabajadores agricolas!
					
					!Este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del partido, propicien abundantes cosechas de toda clase de cereales y frutas!
					
					  !Amontonen las hacinas de cereales cosechados en abundancia en las llanuras cooperativistas de todo el pais!
					
					!La cantidad de fertilizantes es precisamente la de arroz. Produzcan mucho abono organico para hacer fertiles todos los arrozales y campos de secano!
					
					!Aumentemos la produccion de carne, huevo y productos lacteos para hacer mas rica la vida alimentaria del pueblo!
					
					!Hagamos de todas las huertas los campos de frutales en plena cosecha y asentemos sobre la base cientifica y el principio de modernizacion la fruticultura!
					
					  !Aumenten decisivamente la produccion de legumbres y plantas de uso industrial!
					
					  !Incrementen la produccion de los capullos de gusano y algodon para generar una avalancha de seda y telas!
					
					  !Ayuden energicamente al campo todo el partido, todo el pais y todo el pueblo!
					
					  !Incrementemos la produccion pesquera para hacer abundante la mesa de comer del pueblo!
					
					  !Amplien y desarrollen el comercio exterior para contribuir activamente a la mejora de la vida del pueblo!
					
					  !Obreros del dominio de la industria metalurgica!
					
					  !Alcancen la meta de produccion del hierro colado, el acero y los materiales de acero laminado, presentada por el partido!
					
					  !Completen el sistema de produccion del hierro Juche e incrementen en gran medida la produccion de materiales de hierro y acero!
					
					  !Obreros de Kimchol!
					
					  !Abran la brecha en la mejora de la vida del pueblo bajo la antorcha de Kimchol relevada de la de Kangson!
					
					  !Envien mucho mas minerales de hierro a las bases siderurgicas!
					
					  !Obreros del dominio de la industria electrica!
					
					  !Den un salto en la produccion electrica para que repercutan los zumbidos de maquinas llamando el gran auge y se vea el mar de luces del paraiso en todo el pais!
					
					  !Construyan muchas centrales de mediano y pequeno tamanos que fueran muy rentables para que vayan en aumento las aldeas y distritos ricos de electricidad!
					
					  !Obreros de la industria carbonifera!
					
					  !Envien mucho mas carbon de buena calidad a las centrales termoelectricas y las fabricas de las industrias metalurgica, quimica y ligera!
					
					  !Obreros del sector de transporte ferroviario!
					
					  !Intensifiquen la campana por el aumento de transporte a fin de transportar mas rapido muchas cargas a los dominios de la industria ligera, la agricultura y otros en gran auge!
					
					  !Incrementen decisivamente la produccion de locomotoras y vagones y eleven la intensidad de las ferrovias!
					
					  !Fortalezcan el transporte combinado de locomotoras, camiones y barcos!
					
					  !Que se levante todo el pais para ayudar energicamente a las industrias de electricidad, carbon y metalurgia y al dominio de transporte ferroviario!
					
					  !Obreros del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero!
					
					  !Logren un gran auge en la produccion de articulos quimicos para dar acicate a la industria ligera y la agricultura!
					
					  !Productores de abonos de Namhung y Hungnam y otras partes del pais!
					
					  !El fertilizante es precisamente el arroz. Produzcan mucho mas abonos y envienlos al dominio agricola!
					
					  !Obreros del dominio de la industria de maquinaria!
					
					  !Produzcan mayor cantidad de equipos modernos necesarios a la fabricacion de telas y calzados y la elaboracion de alimentos y de maquinas agricolas para enviarlos a los dominios de la industria ligera y la agricultura!
					
					  !Produzcan y provean a tiempo con responsabilidad de los equipos necesarios en los proyectos importantes!
					
					  !Produzcan mucho mas maquinas herramientas CNC, orgullo de la industria del Juche!
					
					  !Impulsen con energia la introduccion de la tecnologia CNC en los equipos mecanicos!
					
					  !Inventen y fabriquen activamente nuevos equipos mecanicos!   !Aceleren la modernizacion de las bases de produccion de herramientas y levanten una fuerte oleada de innovacion de las mismas!
					
					!Demos buen impulso a la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon mediante la movilizacion de todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo en pleno acato a las tareas combativas presentadas en el mensaje de agradecimiento especial del gran General!
					
					!Abramos la "era de prosperidad de Pyongyang" de la epoca del Songun creando la nueva velocidad de Pyongyang en la construccion de la capital!
					
					!Construyan en el nivel maximo las viviendas para 100 mil familias en la ciudad de Pyongyang tomando como modelo las viviendas del reparto Mansudae!
					
					!Ofrezcan las condiciones de vida culta a los habitantes registrando un viraje revolucionario en el urbanismo!
					
					!Eleven mas el nivel cultural y la duracion de las carreteras registrando una innovacion en la vialidad!
					
					!Convirtamos todo el pais en areas boscosas!
					
					!Acondicionemos todas las ciudades y aldeas como las rodeadas de parques en denso verdor!
					
					!Busquen mucho mas tesoros subterraneos!
					
					!Faciliten activamente la comodidad de vida a los habitantes dando acicate a la modernizacion de la rama de comunicaciones!
					
					!Los funcionarios del sector economico!
					
					!Atenganse estrictamente a los principios socialistas en la administracion economica!
					
					!Tracen una cientifica estrategia administrativa y empresarial e impulsen con iniciativa la marcha de gran auge!
					
					!Establezcan una rigurosa disciplina en la planificacion y el sector financiero!
					
					!La autoconfianza es la unica salvacion!
					
					!Arrasemos tajantemente las maniobras de "sancion" de los imperialistas con el oleaje por el gran auge basado en la autoconfianza!
					
					!Hagamos oir con el temple de Songgang los formidables fogonazos, que anuncien la nacionalizacion y la jucheanizacion, en todos los sectores de construccion economica!
					
					!Que conquisten la tecnologia de punta!
					
					!Que avancen con coraje hacia el mundo!
					
					!Que proyecten y creen al estilo coreano!
					
					!Los pies en la tierra patria y la mirada hacia el mundo!
					
					!Creen al estilo coreano cada cosa de la mejor manera que los otros y tengan la osadia de inventar lo que no hay en el mundo!
					
					!Saltemos a lo mas alto y mas rapido explorando las tecnicas de punta conforme a la demanda de la epoca de economia basada en la intelectualidad!
					
					!Promuevan activamente la modernizacion e informatizacion de los procesos productivos fortaleciendo la cooperacion creativa entre los cientificos, los obreros y los tecnicos!
					
					!Superen el nivel mundial mediante la competencia de cerebros y tecnologias!
					
					!Tomemos la hegemonia de lo todo con el impetu con que conquistamos la tecnologia CNC!
					
					!Todos los cientificos y tecnicos!
					
					!Sean vanguardias de la batalla por conquistar la tecnologia de punta en la epoca de IT!
					
					!Eleven al nivel sofisticado todos los sectores de la ciencia y tecnica con el impetu con que han conquistado la ciencia y la tecnica espaciales y la tecnologia nuclear!
					
					!Registren gran salto en el desarrollo de la tecnica de informatica, la nanotecnologia y la biotecnologia!
					
					!Desarrollen rapidamente la ingenieria tecnologica y las ciencias basicas!
					
					Las consignas precisan que la gran potencia prospera del Juche es un pais civilizado con cultura desarrollada y el temperamento de la conquista del nivel sofisticado debe ponerse de pleno manifiesto tambien en el sector cultural, y continuan:
					
					!Hagamos brillar nuestra patria como la potencia de educacion y de talentosos de talla mundial!
					
					!Formen a los pilares fidedignos de la revolucion del Songun dotados de noble espiritu y abundantes conocimientos! 
					
					!Pongamos de pleno manifiesto la superioridad del sistema de la ensenanza obligatoria gratuita mediante el desarrollo de las labores docentes!
					
					!Que materialicen estrictamente la orientacion del Partido en materia de profilactica!
					
					!Que aumenten decisivamente la produccion de las medicinas masivas, medicamentos indispensables para que surta el mayor efecto el sistema de la asistencia medica gratuita!
					
					!Que creen el nuevo "mito deportivo" de Corea del Songun mediante el despliegue energico de las batallas ideologicas, empecinada, de velocidad y tecnica!
					
					!Popularicemos y normalicemos el deporte para el trabajo y la defensa nacional!
					
					!Que levanten la revolucion de pelicula, revolucion de literatura y arte de la epoca del Songun valiendose de la vista innovadora del siglo XXI y el modo de creacion y el estilo de lucha de la decada de 1970!
					
					!Que los periodistas y hombres de palabra sean el trompetero de avance que llame energicamente a todo el ejercito y el pueblo a la batalla de gran auge!
					
					Las consignas senalan que llevar a feliz termino con las fuerzas armadas la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada con armas es la filosofia del fusil del monte Paektu y el gran auge de hoy es el del Songun y continuan:
					
					!Todos los oficiales y los soldados del ejercito popular, la guarnicion popular y el organo de seguridad del pueblo!
					
					!Que garanticen firmemente con fuerzas armadas invencibles la victoria en la gran batalla de la construccion de gran potencia prospera y la felicidad del pueblo!
					
					!Establezcan estrictamente el sistema de la unica direccion del querido camarada Comandante Supremo sobre el ejercito y la disciplina militar revolucionaria!
					
					!Revolucionaricemos a todo el ejercito y hagamos de este los patriotas socialistas!
					
					!Consolidemos ferreamente la gran unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo, raiz de Corea del Songun poniendo de pleno manifiesto el caracter de ayuda al pueblo!
					
					!Hagamos brillar el presente ano significativo del aniversario 65 de la fundacion del Partido con los orgullosos exitos de los preparativos de combate y del fortalecimiento de combatividad!
					
					!Rechacen estrictamente la ilusion a los enemigos y la "paz"!
					
					!Vigilen agudamente las maniobras de los enemigos y mantengan el estado altamente tenso!
					
					!Aniquilemos despiadadamente a los enemigos si se atreven a arrojarnos a su antojo y logremos la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria!
					
					!Creen el modelo de la sociedad desplegando el espiritu revolucionario de los militares que no reconocen la imposibilidad y conduzcan energicamente la marcha por el gran auge! 
					
					!Frustren rotundamente las maniobras de intriga psicologica de los enemigos tendentes a pudrir    ideologica y espiritualmente las fuerzas armadas!
					
					!Que el organo de seguridad del pueblo sea el fidedigno ejercito interior del Comandante Supremo que defiende firmemente la linea avanzada de la lucha clasista!
					
					!Que los organos de seguridad del pueblo y judicial y fiscal cumplan magnificamente con la mision honrosa de defensa al lider, el regimen y el pueblo!
					
					La industria de defensa nacional es la fuente de la dignidad y la potencia de Corea del Songun y la garantia fidedigna de la mejora de la vida del pueblo, destacan las consignas y subrayan:
					
					!Los obreros de la rama de la industria de defensa nacional!
					
					!Consolidemos firmemente la industria revolucionaria del monte Paektu, fabrica de armas de la gran potencia prospera!
					
					 !Que la rama de industria de defensa nacional resuene mas alto el fogonazo de la victoria que tocan a las puertas de la gran potencia prospera!
					
					!Que todas las ramas y unidades suministren a tiempo y primeramente lo necesarios al desarrollo de la industria de defensa nacional!
					
					!Apoyemos activamente al ejercito popular!
					
					!Logremos en el nivel mas alto el armamento de todo el pueblo, la fortificacion de todo el pais!
					
					!Los miembros de la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina y la Guardia Juvenil Roja!
					
					!Mantengan toda la disposicion combativa con la firme concepcion sobre los enemigos!
					
					Las consignas llaman a establecer con mas firmeza en todo el partido el sistema de la unica orientacion del gran camarada Kim Jong Il y agregan:
					
					!Defendamos con firmeza las hazanas del gran camarada Kim Jong Il realizadas en la construccion del Partido y las glorifiquemos para siempre!
					
					!Desarrollemos y fortalezcamos mas nuestro partido como el prometedor que sepa continuar firmemente las tradiciones revolucionarias del Paektu!
					
					!Que todo el partido respire y actue segun la idea del gran auge y el espiritu de marcha forzada del gran camarada Kim Jong Il!
					
					!Materialicemos a cabalidad la linea del partido sobre las masas!
					
					!Servir por el pueblo!
					
					!Fortalezcamos la direccion partidista sobre la labor administrativa y economica conforme a la demanda de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera!
					
					!Desarrollemos sustancialmente el movimiento por la obtencion de la bandera roja de las tres revoluciones para que en todos los campos en gran auge se flameen a todo viento las tres banderas rojas!
					
					!Engendremos a mas benemeritos de la epoca del Songun en la batalla por el gran auge!
					
					!El servicio de abastecimiento es precisamente la labor politica!
					
					!Que mantengan el servicio de abastecimiento como un eslabon importante de la labor del partido!
					
					!Fortalezcamos por todos los medios las funciones y el papel del Poder Popular conforme a la demanda de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera!
					
					!Defendamos el caracter Juche y la nacionalidad en todas las esferas de las actividades estatales!
					
					!Establezcamos estrictamente el orden legal revolucionario mediante el fortalecimiento de la observancia de la ley socialista!
					
					!Que los organos del Poder trabajen con abnegacion por el bienestar del pueblo!
					
					!Todos los funcionarios!
					
					!Sean camaradas del gran camarada Kim Jong Il en la marcha forzada compartiendo con el el ideal, la decision y los pasos!
					
					!Seamos ejecutores consecuentes capaces de escenificar innumerables maravillas de la era del Songun materializando a costa de la vida las politicas del partido aun bajo cualesquier condiciones dificiles!
					
					!Todos los militantes del partido!
					
					!Sean vanguardias de la defensa a ultranza al lider, combatientes en la primera linea de la batalla por el gran auge y diestros en movilizar a las masas!
					
					!Que las organizaciones de masas cumplan satisfactoriamente con su papel de correa de transmision y ayudante confiable del partido en la marcha de gran auge de hoy!
					
					!Que las organizaciones de masas pongan de pleno manifiesto la potencia espiritual de sus miembros fortaleciendo el trabajo organizativo y politico y desplieguen activamente los movimientos masivos como la emulacion socialista!
					
					Las consignas resaltan que la reunificacion de la patria es la tarea suprema y acuciante de la nacion coreana y prosiguen:
					
					!Materialicemos de modo consecuente el legado del gran Lider, camarada Kim Il Sung para la reunificacion de la patria!
					
					!Logremos cuanto antes la reunificacion de la Patria, con la unidad de toda la nacion, bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur!
					
					  !Abramos una nueva coyuntura de la reunificacion independiente en este ano del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y del 30o aniversario de la presentacion del Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo!
					
					  !Frustremos las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion y realicemos activamente la reconciliacion y la cooperacion de la nacion!
					
					  !Todos los compatriotas y hermanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar!
					
					!Edifiquemos sobre el territorio patrio de tres mil ries (10 ries equivalen a 4 km) una gran potencia reunificada, que fuera muy digna y prospera, para legarla a las generaciones venideras!
					
					  !La independencia es la justicia y esta triunfa sin falta!
					
					  !Mantengamos firmemente la posicion independiente en las relaciones exteriores para que todo el mundo vea la dignidad y el impetu de la Corea del Songun!
					
					!Defendamos y llevemos adelante el socialismo, ideal y futuro de la humanidad!
					
					!Frustremos las maniobras belicas y agresivas de los imperialistas y preservemos la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo!
					
					!Ampliemos y desarrollemos las relaciones de buena vecindad y amistad con todos los paises del mundo que respetan la soberania de nuestro pais!
					
					!Todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y los habitantes!
					
					Es definitivo el triunfo de la batalla por el gran auge y es nuestro el porvenir prometedor. 
					
					!Todos a la ofensiva general hacia la plaza de festejo de octubre abrigando la fe y el optimismo de la victoria cierta!
					
					!Realicemos con brillantez el deseo y el ideal de toda la vida del lider padre quien dedico toda su vida por la felicidad del pueblo y le demos con reverencia el parte de victoria y alegria!
					
					!Hagan que el mundo admire al gran partido y a la Corea de Kim Il Sung!

articles.title: Kim Yong Il envia mensaje a Tillman Thomas
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il envia mensaje a Tillman Thomas
 Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- El premier del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Il, envio el dia 6 un mensaje de felicitacion al primer ministro de Granada, Tillman Thomas, con motivo del 36o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					 El remitente desea al amistoso pueblo granadiense prosperidad y bienestar.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Nigeria
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Nigeria
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- Segun un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jong Hak Se fue designado como embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en la Republica Federal de Nigeria.

articles.title: Campaa conflictiva con la RPDC impide mejorar relaciones N-S
articles.content:
Campaa conflictiva con la RPDC impide mejorar relaciones N-S
Pyongyang, 6 de febrero (ATCC) -- Para mejorar este ao las empeoradas relaciones Norte-Sur y abrir una nueva coyuntura favorable al cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacin, hay que acabar cuanto antes en el Sur de Corea con las maniobras de confrontacin anti-Repblica Popular Democrtica de Corea que van en contra de la corriente de la poca. 
					 Seala as el diario Rodong Sinmun en un artculo individual difundido en su edicin de este sbado y prosigue: 
					
					 Las crueles maniobras de confrontacin anti-RPDC de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos devienen el escollo principal que impide la unidad de la nacin y la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					 Al abogar por el supuesto "desarrollo de relaciones Sur-Norte a base de principios" en el llamado "informe de trabajo de 2010", las autoridades surcoreanas definieron el "debate activo del problema nuclear en el dilogo Sur-Norte" como el ncleo de la "poltica sobre el Norte" de este ao. 
					
					 La opinin de que se debe presentar el problema nuclear, que no tiene nada que ver con las relaciones ntercoreanas, como el tema principal del dilogo Norte-Sur, es la continuacin de la poltica de confrontacin y anti-reunificacin de "la desnuclearizacin, la apertura y 3 mil dlares" y la expresin de siniestra intencin de impedir el avance de las relaciones Norte-Sur bajo el pretexto del problema nuclear e intensificar la campaa nuclear anti-RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					 Las maniobras de las autoridades surcoreanas, que buscan la guerra de agresin al Norte y el enfrentamiento entre sistemas sociales, devienen la campaa premeditada que rompe el clima por la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur y lleva a la catstrofe la situacin. 
					
					 La camarilla de conservadores surcoreanos traz los intrigantes guiones de agresin al Norte como "Bsqueda y estudio del gran programa de la reunificacin" suponiendo la absurdsima "situacin bruscamente cambiada", lo cual revela su malsana ambicin de negar el digno sistema de la RPDC y realizar la "reunificacin mediante la absorcin". 
					
					  La represin fascista de las autoridades surcoreanas contra el movimiento por la reunificacin deviene un crimen intolerable que perjudica la reconciliacin y la unidad de la nacin. 
					
					  Bajo esa feroz campaa de represin, no se puede realizar libremente la discusin y las actividades de distintos sectores por la reunificacin ni los contactos ni intercambio entre los connacionales.
